alert.note: Alert for Athens (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:24AM EST until February 20 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Charleston WV has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Ohio... Hocking River At Athens affecting Athens County. For the Hocking River...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hocking River At Athens. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Low areas, campground, and private camps along the river between Athens and Coolville begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 AM EST Saturday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 20.3 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.3 feet on 11/18/1985. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/rlx. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EST.
